name: Stealth Santa
description:
Stealth Santa!

This is a game for "The Big Festive Game Jam"

Objective:

Stealth Santa is a stealth game in voxel art where you are Santa and you have to bring gifts to the kids but watch out! They're looking for you... Don't let them SURPRISE you!

FIND the key to unlock the door, TAKE the gifts and DROP them under the Christmas Tree. Will you make it?

pssss. press ESC to exit the game :P
